item.title: Add feature - scheduler with warmup each cycle
item.description: Referring by this Github Repo, I added CosineAnnealingScheduler with warmup each cycle : PR For consistency, I add argument in LinearCyclicalScheduler class while preserving BC(backward compatibility) : PR Also I added test code for above new arguments
